de.unisiegen.tpml.core.typechecker
Class AbstractTypeCheckerProofRule

java.lang.Object
  de.unisiegen.tpml.core.AbstractProofRule
      de.unisiegen.tpml.core.typechecker.AbstractTypeCheckerProofRule
All Implemented Interfaces:
ProofRule, TypeCheckerProofRule, Comparable<ProofRule>
abstract class AbstractTypeCheckerProofRule
extends AbstractProofRule
implements TypeCheckerProofRule

Abstract base class for implementations of the TypeCheckerProofRule interface.

Version:
$Rev: 415 $
Author:
Benedikt Meurer
See Also:
TypeCheckerProofRule, AbstractProofRule

Constructor Detail

AbstractTypeCheckerProofRule

AbstractTypeCheckerProofRule(int group,
                             String name)
Allocates a new AbstractTypeCheckerProofRule of the specified name.

Parameters:
group - the group id of the type rule, see the description of the AbstractProofRule.getGroup() method for details.
name - the name of the type rule to allocate.
Throws:
NullPointerException - if name is null.
See Also:
AbstractProofRule#AbstractProofRule(String)
Method Detail

apply

public void apply(TypeCheckerProofContext context,
                  TypeCheckerProofNode node)
           throws ProofRuleException
Applies this type checker proof rule to the specified node via the given context.

Specified by:
apply in interface TypeCheckerProofRule
Parameters:
context - the type checker proof context via which the application of this rule to the node should be performed.
node - the type checker proof node to which to apply this rule.
Throws:
ProofRuleException - if this rule cannot be applied to the node.
See Also:
TypeCheckerProofRule.apply(de.unisiegen.tpml.core.typechecker.TypeCheckerProofContext, de.unisiegen.tpml.core.typechecker.TypeCheckerProofNode)

update

public void update(TypeCheckerProofContext context,
                   TypeCheckerProofNode node)
Updates the specified node as part of a previous rule application for context. This method is only interesting for special rules like (P-LET), that cannot be fully handled via the unification algorithm.

Specified by:
update in interface TypeCheckerProofRule
Parameters:
context - the main proof context, which was previously specified as parameter to an TypeCheckerProofRule.apply(TypeCheckerProofContext, TypeCheckerProofNode) invokation on another proof node, possibly with another proof rule.
node - the TypeCheckerProofNode that may need to be updated.
See Also:
TypeCheckerProofRule.update(de.unisiegen.tpml.core.typechecker.TypeCheckerProofContext, de.unisiegen.tpml.core.typechecker.TypeCheckerProofNode)

applyInternal

protected abstract void applyInternal(TypeCheckerProofContext context,
                                      TypeCheckerProofNode node)
                               throws Exception
Abstract internal apply method, implemented by the AbstractTypeCheckerProofRuleSet class while registering new proof rules.

Parameters:
context - see apply(TypeCheckerProofContext, TypeCheckerProofNode).
node - see apply(TypeCheckerProofContext, TypeCheckerProofNode).
Throws:
Exception - if an error occurs while applying the rule to the node using the context.
See Also:
apply(TypeCheckerProofContext, TypeCheckerProofNode)

updateInternal

protected abstract void updateInternal(TypeCheckerProofContext context,
                                       TypeCheckerProofNode node)
                                throws Exception
Abstract internal update method, implemented by the AbstractTypeCheckerProofRuleSet class while registering new proof rules.

Parameters:
context - see update(TypeCheckerProofContext, TypeCheckerProofNode).
node - see update(TypeCheckerProofContext, TypeCheckerProofNode).
Throws:
Exception - if an error occurs while updating the node using the context.
